title: E-Commerce Product Web Scraping
description: Build a desktop GUI Application with Python programming language to create a web scraping system based on Selenium. The goal of this project is to gather data for Data Analytics purposes to predict future behavior.

title: Fintech Automation System
description: Unlock Data Insights: Python GUI for Selenium Web Scraping & Predictive Analytics! The goal of this project is to gather data for Data Analytics purposes to predict future behavior

title: Document Conversion and P12 Signing
description: Seamless Conversion & Timestamp Signing Program Try Now! and Transform DOCX to PDF This Program was created with Python, Java, Django, and Spring Integration!

title: Bluetooth Positioning
description: Membuat sistem beacon scanning dengan menggunakan ESP32 untuk mengetahui device yang melakukan scan ada di lantai berapa. Terdapat pembuatan aplikasi juga yang menunjukkan beacon yang di-scan dan juga sistem navigasi dengan GPS menggunakan React Native.
